tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_progress_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  team_member_name VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL,
  tasks_completed INT NOT NULL,
  tasks_pending INT NOT NULL,
  productivity_rating FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE team_members (   member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   member_name VARCHAR(255),   role VARCHAR(100),   department VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE work_logs (   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   member_id INT,   log_date DATE,   hours_worked INT,   task_description TEXT,   FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id) );

CREATE TABLE task_progress (   task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   task_description TEXT,   assigned_to INT,   deadline DATE,   status VARCHAR(50),   FOREIGN KEY (assigned_to) REFERENCES team_members(member_id) );

CREATE TABLE team_members (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE team_tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(100),
  assignee_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  due_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE task_progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT,
  assignee_id INT,
  percentage_complete INT,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE team_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(100),
  generated_by INT,
  generated_on TIMESTAMP,
  details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE team_members (
	member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50),
	position VARCHAR(50),
	department VARCHAR(50),
	joined_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE tasks (
	task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	task_name VARCHAR(100),
	assigned_to INT,
	priority VARCHAR(20),
	deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE task_progress (
	progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	task_id INT,
	member_id INT,
	progress_percentage INT,
	progress_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE weekly_reports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	week_number INT,
	year INT,
	report_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE team_performance (
	performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	member_id INT,
	task_id INT,
	performance_rating INT,
	performance_date DATE
)
